text:
18.6. Develop an Autoregressive Model 361
Re-running the code example with this change results is a zoomed-in version of the plots
with much less clutter. We can clearly see a familiar autoregression pattern across the two plots.
This pattern is comprised of two elements:
 ACF: A large number of signiﬁcant lag observations that slowly degrade as the lag
increases.
 PACF: A few signiﬁcant lag observations that abruptly drop as the lag increases.
